thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie | 3 of 38
thread.title: Elizabeth Corcoran

author: Elizabeth Corcoran
title: Elizabeth Corcoran
text:
I have had no issues with energia since I joined them..
At first I didn't like the idea of paperless billing, but it's good.. I did their same amount payment through out the year which I found handy for me as the same amount was taken every month.
Also if you missed a payment , you received an email notification.. I have found the staff on the telephone to be very helpful.
